H3.text: Roald Dahl's BFG was a big, friendly what. Giant

A4.text: The BFG (short for The Big Friendly Giant) is a 1982 children's novel by British author Roald Dahl.

A5.text: The BFG: A friendly 24-foot-tall giant who has superhuman hearing and immense speed.
